forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain after 4am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. North wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the sun ascends in a brightening San Francisco sky, the city awakens wrapped in a blanket of clarity, save for the gentle remnants of the morning marine layer. The views toward the Golden Gate Bridge shimmer in crispness, illuminating the day ahead with a promise of mildness. With highs coaxing the mercury near the low sixties and a very subtle north wind rustling through, it is a morning ripe for exploration beneath a mostly sunny veil. Yet, as afternoon tiptoes in, temperatures will dip slightly—a reminder of the Pacific’s lingering embrace.

Tonight, the tranquility shifts as a chance of rain looms on the horizon, arriving post-midnight with a whisper of possibility. For now, the charm of the day invites leisurely pursuits, whether it’s a stroll along your favorite waterfront café or a wander through the vibrant streets adorned by the iconic architecture of the city. Dress lightly but layer appropriately; a light jacket or sweater will by no means be excessive as the gentle breeze may cool the air. Although fog may return, for now, a golden day unfolds, waiting for you to seize its quiet pleasures.
